verses.verse: A Song of Ascents. Behold, bless <S%H1288><s%> ye Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, all ye servants <S%H5650><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, That by night <S%H3915><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
Lift up <S%H5375><s%> your hands <S%H3027><s%> to the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, And bless <S%H1288><s%> ye Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> thee out of Zion <S%H6726><s%>; Even he that made <S%H6213><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%>.
